| History                 = The Green Thumb was an environmentalist offshoot of [[Hand (Earth-616)|The Hand]] that set up training facilities in the [[Amazon Jungle|Amazon]]. [[Laura Kinney (Earth-616)|Wolverine (Laura Kinney)]] was sent by the time-displaced [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] to deal with them, but the time-displaced [[Warren Worthington III (Earth-616)|Angel]] had already disposed of them when she arrived.{{r|All-New X-Men Vol 2 12}}
